流程控件

\n

示例

\n

##基础Pearls

\n

常用于流程步骤的跟踪。

\n
\n
\n

Default

\n
\n
\n
\n 1\n Account Info\n
\n
\n 2\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n 3\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
.content{\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.example{\n width: 60%;\n margin: 80px;\n}\n.col-xs-4{\n width: 33.3%;\n float: left;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="example-wrap">\n <h4 class="example-title">Default</h4>\n <div class="example">\n <div class="pearls row">\n <div class="pearl done col-xs-4">\n <span class="pearl-number">1</span>\n <span class="pearl-title">Account Info</span>\n </div>\n <div class="pearl current col-xs-4">\n <span class="pearl-number">2</span>\n <span class="pearl-title">Billing Info</span>\n </div>\n <div class="pearl col-xs-4">\n <span class="pearl-number">3</span>\n <span class="pearl-title">Confirmation</span>\n </div>\n </div>\n </div>\n</div>
\n
\n\n

##带icon的Pearls

\n

将数据换成icon，适用于多场景的流程步骤。

\n
\n
\n

Icon

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n Account Info\n
\n
\n
\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n
\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
.content{\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.example{\n width: 60%;\n margin: 80px;\n}\n.col-xs-4{\n width: 33.3%;\n float: left;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="example-wrap">\n <h4 class="example-title">Icon</h4>\n <div class="example">\n <div class="pearls row">\n <div class="pearl done col-xs-4">\n <div class="pearl-icon"><i class="icon uf uf-usershape" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>\n <span class="pearl-title">Account Info</span>\n </div>\n <div class="pearl current col-xs-4">\n <div class="pearl-icon"><i class="icon uf uf-creditcard" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>\n <span class="pearl-title">Billing Info</span>\n </div>\n <div class="pearl col-xs-4">\n <div class="pearl-icon"><i class="icon uf uf-correctsymbol" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>\n <span class="pearl-title">Confirmation</span>\n </div>\n </div>\n </div>\n</div>
\n
\n\n

##不同尺寸Pearls

\n

pearls-xs pearls-sm pearls-lg 供尺寸的选择

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n 1\n Account Info\n
\n
\n 2\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n 3\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n 1\n Account Info\n
\n
\n 2\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n 3\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n 1\n Account Info\n
\n
\n 2\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n 3\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n 1\n Account Info\n
\n
\n 2\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n 3\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n

.content{\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.example{\n width: 60%;\n margin: 80px;\n}\n.col-xs-4{\n width: 33.3%;\n float: left;\n}

##多状态Pearls

\n

通过icon和边框颜色表明当前状态

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n Account Info\n
\n
\n
\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n
\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n Account Info\n
\n
\n
\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n
\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n Account Info\n
\n
\n
\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n
\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n Account Info\n
\n
\n
\n Billing Info\n
\n
\n
\n Confirmation\n
\n
\n
\n
.content{\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.example{\n width: 60%;\n margin: 80px;\n}\n.col-xs-4{\n width: 33.3%;\n float: left;\n}
